name: places/ChIJtVazIfdYwokRwFLVQQema9k
formattedAddress: 160 Central Park S Suite 1101-62, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 Central Park S Suite 1101-62, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
In the heart of NYC, my family and I shared an extended stay at this breathtaking location. Everything was a living dream starting off with the views (Every window was had a picturesque view no matter what window you chose). The location was at the central node and ideally situated convenient to all the major attractions nearby (Bryant Park, Grand Central, Time Square & Central Park).
My wife and I have traveled to many places around the world but nothing tops the experience of choosing Lauren Berger Collections.
Our trip was far beyond a stale environment as you get while you're staying at commercial places . Lauren Berger is the up most hospitable, attentive and passionate person at what she does. She puts you first before anything, no matter what you need, she's got it covered. My favorite part of our stay was getting to meet Lauren, it was a true honor. Lauren has managed to connect with us on a personal level and make our stay feel better than home.

If it's not LAUREN, it must be boring.

originalText.text: I had the most wonderful stay at this apartment! Everything was absolutely perfect. The host was the nicest person I've ever met, and her hospitality was exceptional. The apartment was incredibly clean and comfortable, making it feel like a home away from home, looks exactly like the pictures. After experiencing such a fantastic stay, I wouldn't even consider staying anywhere else now that I've found this gem. I can't recommend it enough!

originalText.text:
A Luxurious Delight - Lauren's Rentals Exceed Expectations!

I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the exceptional service provided by Lauren's luxury rental agency, and I must say, it was an absolute delight from start to finish. Lauren, the owner, is an incredibly lovely person who goes above and beyond to ensure her guests have an unforgettable experience.

The rentals offered by Lauren are nothing short of stunning. From the moment I stepped into one of her properties, I was captivated by the sheer beauty and attention to detail. The interiors were exquisitely designed, with a perfect blend of elegance, comfort, and modernity. Every corner reflected the owner's impeccable taste and dedication to creating a truly luxurious ambiance.

But what truly sets Lauren apart is her warm and inviting personality. She is a pleasant and accommodating host who genuinely cares about her guests' satisfaction. From the initial inquiry to the end of my stay, Lauren was always available, responsive, and eager to ensure everything was perfect. Her professionalism and passion for hospitality shone through in every interaction.

During my stay, Lauren's attentiveness and dedication to making my experience exceptional were evident. She provided thoughtful amenities, offered valuable local recommendations, and went out of her way to ensure my comfort and enjoyment. It truly felt like staying with a dear friend who genuinely cared about my well-being.

I can wholeheartedly recommend Lauren's luxury rental agency to anyone seeking an unforgettable experience. With her exceptional properties, lovely personality, and unparalleled hospitality, Lauren has created a truly remarkable oasis for those seeking the pinnacle of luxury and comfort. My stay surpassed all expectations, and I look forward to returning to one of Lauren's rentals in the future.

Thank you, Lauren, for making my stay truly memorable!

originalText.text: I recently stayed in New York City and I was lucky enough to have worked with Lauren Berger for an extended family vacation in the city. I would highly recommend working with Lauren Berger for any of your travel needs.

text.text: I recently stayed in New York City and I was lucky enough to have worked with Lauren Berger for an extended family vacation in the city. I would highly recommend working with Lauren Berger for any of your travel needs.

originalText.text: Lauren and her team made our trip to NYC very memorable.  The place we stayed was in the middle of everything downtown and fit all 8 of us with ease.  It was beautiful and offered amenities that a hotel would not have, like a full kitchen and a balcony.  She also checked in on us during the trip to make sure we were having a good time.  We would highly recommend.
